## toMap() function

Quickly turn an array of Intents and Handlers to a map with the intentIds as the keys.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function toMap<T extends Intent>(intents: T[]): {
    [id: string]: T;
};
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  intents | T\[\] |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

{ \[id: string\]: T; }
